headline: As France tries to contain cattle lumpy skin disease, PM seeks Christmas truce with agricultural unions
description: The prime minister met Friday with leaders of France's main farming unions but did not announce any real change in managing an outbreak of lumpy skin disease, or contagious nodular dermatitis.
